name: lyra-monorepo
description: A simple, fast, and modern static site generator for building faster websites with Astro and Tailwind CSS.
author: Yuniel Acosta <yunielacosta738@gmail.com>

scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm exec playwright install
scripts.clean: echo 🧹 Cleaning repo && pnpm --recursive --parallel --stream run clean
scripts.check: echo ✔︎ Checking frontend && pnpm --recursive --parallel --stream run lint && pnpm --recursive --parallel --stream run check
scripts.format: echo 🖌️ Formatting frontend && pnpm --recursive --parallel --stream run format
scripts.lint: echo 🚨 Linting frontend && pnpm --recursive --parallel --stream run lint
